title: new client
body:
hi 
i have a question some of my friends have their skin on the profile and lik me it is always the normal champ. how does it work or how can i show my skin on my most played champ ??

grts

replies.body:
If you don't have a special summoner Icon that changes the champ on your profile page (like the Ultimate Skin Icons), the champion in the background of your profile should be the champ you have the highest mastery points with. This means you'll need to play more of the champ you want to become the background in order to level up their mastery points and show them on your profile.

Let me know if this helped.
